projects.title: Tourism Website
projects.description: A comprehensive tourism website showcasing popular destinations with booking functionality. Features include location filtering, user reviews, and interactive maps.

projects.title: E-Cart Ecommerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured ecommerce website with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing. Includes admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Smart Drain Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT-enabled solution for monitoring and managing drainage systems in smart cities. Provides real-time alerts and predictive maintenance capabilities.

projects.title: Ather Wallet - Blockchain Wallet
projects.description: Decentralized wallet application built on Holochain technology. Enables secure cryptocurrency transactions and portfolio management.

projects.title: Book Exchange Platform
projects.description: Community platform for book lovers to exchange, donate, or sell used books. Includes search functionality and user rating system.

projects.title: Health Reminder App
projects.description: Personal health assistant that tracks medication schedules, water intake, and exercise routines with customizable notifications.

projects.title: Recipe Finder Application
projects.description: Interactive application that helps users discover recipes based on available ingredients. Includes nutritional information and meal planning features.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive fitness tracking dashboard that visualizes workout data, progress trends, and provides personalized recommendations.
